data.title: VIS-Games | game developer
data.meta_description: VIS-Games - the history of the company and a its achivements.
data.text:
VIS-Games is a developer of video games.

VIS-Games has been active on the market since before 2012.

One of its first projects was game Firefighters: The Simulation.

In publishing its games, VIS-Games collaborates with UIG Entertainment. The developer's most recent work is Firefighters: The Simulation. Production release occurred on 24 April 2018.
